channel.title: [317] Xecronation Loading 634 maps - Webclient Ready [v 1.0]
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][B]Hello everyone,[/B][/COLOR]
[b]So i started last week with a project together with Warrior. Our main goals were to creat as simple as possible server for everyone. I did the client side, so i added a few sexy interfaces maps etc.
Credits: Sanity Me Rune-server Aroused and all other people i forgot
Download link client&cache:
Cache: http://up.ht/zZ3XcK Client: http://up.ht/y6S9Wf
Download link server: http://uppit.com/4tjapf9xop9h/Xecronation_Source.rar
What does this contain: 602+ anims 634 character 634 maps My own flo.dat New skill interface New prayer interfaces Money pouch Xp toggle 602+ npc 525 objects way better than 508 objects! New gameframe and much more+ [U]This does not have Fullscreen included!![/U]
Server Features: Better stability Fixed some dupes Quikprayers works fine Fixed money puch dupe PVP system Base BH, ::bh ::bh1 ::bh2 ::bh3 ::bh4 and ::bh5 Added some own features And alot more, but im more a clientside person than a serverside
Watch out im gonna post alot of pics
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mtmnhv.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/xp8mt2.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/nfqhd5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/axedxx.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/hs9s38.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/10wqfih.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/wre7ba.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/qyeb2u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/spdlpy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r559gl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/n5pkd3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/300cfar.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/il9co4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/aafa1c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5y80ao.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/178t8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/nycum9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2jcasrp.png[/img]
Freezing Fix - This fixing the freezing for certain area's such as Armadyl Chamber.
Go to your OnDemandFetcher.java and replace this method562 with this: [CODE] public int method562(int i, int k, int l) { int i1 = (l << 8) + k; int mapNigga2; int mapNigga3; for(int j1 = 0; j1 < mapIndices1.length; j1++) { if(mapIndices1[j1] == i1) { if(i == 0) { mapNigga2 = mapIndices2[j1] > 3535 ? -1 : mapIndices2[j1]; return mapNigga2; } else { mapNigga3 = mapIndices3[j1] > 3535 ? -1 : mapIndices3[j1]; return mapNigga3; } } } return -1; }[/CODE][/b]

item.title: [317] Xecronation Loading 634 maps - Webclient Ready [v 1.0]
item.dc:creator: @MelStone MelStone
item.description:
@MelStone wrote:

[quote=“Omg I Rawr, post:18, topic:436742”]in wich one?

the run.bat?

@echo off title Xecronation by Valentino java -server -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

or the run.sh?

or in both?[/quote]
whatever one you run normally…? (or the one you ran before posting that question)

Read full topic
